blogs.title: The Fastest Way to Learn React
content: Welcome! Today we're going to talk about React.
React is a powerful JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
Here’s the fastest way to learn React step-by-step.

blogs.name: learn-node
blogs.title: How to Build a Node Server in 10 Minutes
content: In this article, we'll show you how to set up a Node.js server in just a few minutes.
Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform JavaScript runtime environment.
We will walk through setting up your server, creating endpoints, and running it locally.

blogs.name: my-thoughts-on-learning-react
blogs.title: My Thoughts on Learning ReactJS
content: Learning ReactJS can be tough, but it’s totally worth the effort.
In this blog, I’ll share my personal thoughts on how I learned React.
React is flexible and easy to learn once you understand the basic concepts.
